questions.question: What are the ingredients in a Coconut Mojito?
questions.answer: Malibu Rum, Coconut Water, Sweet & Sour, Soda Water, Mint Strips, Stevia, Lime Wheel

questions.question: How many ounces of Malibu Rum are used in a Coconut Mojito?
How many ounces of Coconut Water are used?
How many ounces of Sweet and Sour are used?
How many ounces of Soda Water are used?
What are the garnishes for a Coconut Mojito? (Select 2)
